channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- StoredIQ
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- StoredIQ

item.title: CVE-2019-4163|2024-08-04T19:33:36.927Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoreIQ 7.6.0.0. through 7.6.0.18 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information that a privileged user should only be allowed to view. IBM X-Force ID: 158696.

item.title: CVE-2020-4224|2024-08-04T08:00:07.094Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoredIQ 7.6.0.17 through 7.6.0.20 could disclose sensitive information to a local user due to data in certain directories not being encrypted when it contained symbolic links. IBM X-Force ID: 175133.

item.title: CVE-2019-4166|2024-08-04T19:33:36.925Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoredIQ 7.6 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 158699.

item.title: CVE-2019-4165|2024-08-04T19:33:37.786Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoreIQ 7.6.0.0. through 7.6.0.18 could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service attack using repeated requests to the server. IBM X-Force ID: 158698.

item.title: CVE-2019-4167|2024-08-04T19:33:37.982Z -- ibm -- storediq
item.description: IBM StoredIQ 7.6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 158700.
